dcterms:creator: Yash Chandak
Georgios Theocharous
James Kostas
Scott Jordan
Philip Thomas
dcterms:description: A maze environment used as a testbed in state-of-the-art works on large discrete action spaces, where an agent navigates through a maze, avoiding obstructions and finding a goal position.
dcterms:title: Maze Environment

dcterms:creator: Robert N. Boute
Joren Gijsbrechts
Willem van Jaarsveld
Nathalie Vanvuchelen
dcterms:description: A joint inventory replenishment problem where a retailer manages uncertain demand for different items in a warehouse, deciding on ordering quantities to minimize total costs.
dcterms:title: Joint Inventory Replenishment Problem

dcterms:creator: Xinquan Wu
Xuefeng Yan
dcterms:description: A dynamic job-shop scheduling problem where jobs are allocated to machines with the goal of balancing loads and minimizing energy consumption.
dcterms:title: Dynamic Job-Shop Scheduling Problem
